meanings.definition: The state or quality of being incompatible.
meanings.sent1: The incompatibilities between their schedules made it difficult to plan a meeting.
meanings.sent2: There were clear incompatibilities between their personalities, causing constant arguments.
meanings.sent3: The incompatibilities in their taste in music led to some hilarious car ride arguments.
meanings.sent4: The incompatibilities in their beliefs created a wall between them that was hard to break down.
meanings.sent5: The incompatibilities in their working styles were like oil and water, never mixing well.

meanings.definition: Lack of harmony or agreement between two or more things.
meanings.sent1: The incompatibilities in their opinions on the project caused delays.
meanings.sent2: The incompatibilities in their schedules made it hard to find a common time to meet.
meanings.sent3: The incompatibilities in their fashion sense always led to interesting outfit choices.
meanings.sent4: The incompatibilities in their tastes created a discord that was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The incompatibilities in their communication styles made it hard to understand each other.

meanings.definition: The inability to exist or work together harmoniously.
meanings.sent1: The incompatibilities in their personalities made it hard to collaborate effectively.
meanings.sent2: The incompatibilities in their work ethic led to constant conflicts.
meanings.sent3: The incompatibilities in their cooking styles always resulted in interesting dinner choices.
meanings.sent4: The incompatibilities in their goals created a barrier between them.
meanings.sent5: The incompatibilities in their approaches to problem-solving made teamwork challenging.
